articles.title: 'Argylle' Review: Matthew Vaughn's Absurd Spy Adventure Lacks Claws - IndieWire
articles.description: “Argylle” aspires towards the same ridiculousness that made Vaughn’s “Kingsman” so much fun, but it trips over its high-concept at every turn.
